name: Launch
data: Launch the Greedy Gorillas on the Solana blockchain

name: Mint, Secondary Markets & Discord
data: After minting has successfully completed, Greedy Gorillas will be listed on the secondary market places Magic Eden and Alpha Art. The discord server will be released to the public after mint.

name: Announce Prize Winners
data: 3 randomly selected prize winners will be announced on twitter and discord. 1st prize: Brand New Rolex or $10,000 USD in sol 2nd prize: 10 sol 3rd prize: 5 sol

name: Floor Sweep
data: 50% of royalties will go towards buying bankrupt and unsuccessful greedy gorillas off the secondary market, then removing them from the supply. This leaves only the greediest of gorillas to compete

name: Reward Delisted Greedy Gorillas
data: Random Snapshot to be taken to reward lucky delisted Greedy Gorillas.

name: Virtual Space in the Metaverse
data: Obtain and make available an exclusive virtual space in the Solana metaverse for VIP pass holders. We will get a community vote on whether we should have more exclusive virtual spaces for particular Greedy Gorillas traits.

name: Creation and Distribution of $GGCASH
data: Creation of the Greedy Gorillas token, $GGCASH. This will be airdropped to all Greedy Gorillas holders. More information coming soon on this.

name: Exclusive Access to Future Projects
data: Exclusive access and whitelist spots for Greedy Gorillas holders with future NFT projects
